publicwhip.spmotion: * S2M-3294 Michael Matheson:Camanachd Cup Final—That the Parliament congratulates Fort William and Kilmallie for reaching the final of the Camanachd Cup, which will be held at An Aird, Fort William on 17 September 2005; commends BBC Television and Radio for broadcasting the game live and calls on the media to do more to promote shinty in order to raise the profile of Scotland’s oldest indigenous sport which has been played in all corners of the world, and congratulates the new board of directors of the Camanachd Association who are presently implementing a four-year game plan to secure the future of the sport. Supported by: Linda Fabiani*, Christine Grahame*, Ms Sandra White*, Jim Mather*, Fiona Hyslop*
S2M-3294 Camanachd Cup Final (lodged on 16 September 2005) Rob Gibson*
S2M-3294 Camanachd Cup Final (lodged on 16 September 2005) Mr Adam Ingram*, Donald Gorrie*
S2M-3294 Camanachd Cup Final (lodged on 16 September 2005) Mr Kenny MacAskill*
